game.name: Rose in the Mist
game.shortDescription: A fantasy-adventure visual novel with choices that affect the heroine's character and the ending she arrives at. Meet the residents of the Misty Witch's estate and get close to her mysterious guests. Love, friendship and hatred in a fascinating story.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A fantasy-adventure visual novel with choices that affect the heroine's character and the ending she arrives at. Meet the residents of the Misty Witch's estate and get close to her mysterious guests. Love, friendship and hatred in a fascinating story.
